greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Number of compositions of n with first part 2 and no equal adjacent parts; this is column 2 of the array in A096568.
formula: Define s(0)=1, T(1, 1)=1 and T(i, j)=0 for j>i. For n>=2 and 1<=k<=n, define s(n)=T(n, 1)+T(n, 2)+...+T(n, n) and T(n, k)=s(n-k)-T(n-k, k). (This is array A096568.)
results.author: _Clark Kimberling_, Jun 27 2004
